Text: Don’t be selfish; don’t try to impress others. Be humble, thinking of others as better than yourselves. Don’t look out only for your own interests, but take an interest in others, too. You must have the same attitude that Christ Jesus had.
Wisdom will save you from the ways of wicked men, from men whose words are perverse,
Serve the Lord with fear and celebrate his rule with trembling.
Discarding, but not forgetting, lest the process be repeated, the square wheel reinvented.

Word: The trait of great self-denial (especially refraining from worldly pleasures
